Combines different classes of insurance to cover loss or damage to property, liability and personal accident matters for Joint Management Body (JMB) and Joint Management Corporation (JMC).
Covers building and contents from loss or damage caused by fire and lightning. The coverage could also be extended to include special perils.
Covers loss of profit upon business interruption due to fire or other extended perils covered under the Standard Fire policy.
Provides compensation if your machinery, equipment, furniture, fixtures and fittings kept and/or used within your premises suffer loss or damage caused by fire, theft or any other accidental means.
An all-in-one insurance package solution tailored for SMEs and Large Commercial risk with sum insured of up to RM100 million.
Comprehensive group medical insurance that covers all employees hospitalisation due to illness or accidents.
For authorised drivers, co-drivers, attendants and passengers of commercial vehicles aged between 18 and 60 years who seek protection against loss of life or bodily injuries.

For owners of goods-carrying vehicles, hired cars, buses and special types of transport who wish to be protected against loss or damage to their vehicles and against liabilities to other parties for injury, death or property damage.
For owners of motor trade plates who wish to be covered against loss or damage to their vehicles and against liabilities to other parties for injury, death or property damage.

Indemnifies employers against the liability of law to compensate your employees by paying for cost and expenses in respect of accidental bodily injury or disease arising out of or in the course of employment. The standard Common Law limit is RM1,000,000 for any one accident and in the aggregate.

Provides indemnity against all sums for which you shall be liable to pay compensation to any employee for personal injury sustained by accidents or occupational diseases arising out of and in the course of his employment under:

The Workmen’s Compensation Act 1952 and the subsequent amendments to the Act or
The Common Law. The standard Common Law limit is RM1,000,000 for any one accident and in the aggregate.

Provides indemnity up to the limit of liability, against all sums which you may become legally liable to pay a third party due to accidents arising from the course of business occurring within territorial limits.

Safeguard your business and assets at a time when many cannot afford to be disrupted by setbacks caused by unforeseen risks. It comprises a selection of 8 insurance classes, all packaged at competitive rates.

Provides indemnity to the employer against loss of money or property as a result of acts of fraud or dishonesty of any employee during the uninterrupted continuance of employment in connection with the occupation and duties of the said employee.

Covers against loss or damage to property consequent to actual, forcible and violent entry into or exit from the premises, damage to insured property or to the premises as a result of theft or any threat including armed robbery or a hold up.
Covers replacement or payment for any accidental breakage of the Plate Glass situated at the Insured’s premises.
Covers the loss of money whilst in transit within the territorial limit specified in the policy and whilst kept in locked drawers, safe or strong rooms on the business premises.
